content: Use this section to create several spaces and make them accessible for your users

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a descriptive subheader that guides users on how to use the section. It appears in a portal dialog when creating new spaces and provides contextual information about its purpose.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Bir neçə sahə yaratmaq və onları istifadəçiləriniz üçün əlçatan etmək üçün bu bölmədən istifadə edin" is a bit literal and verbose. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the purpose of the section. The English 'Use this section...' directly translates to 'Bu bölmədən istifadə edin...', which is correct, but it makes the sentence feel awkward in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like: "Bu bölmədə istifadəçiləriniz üçün bir neçə ərazi yarada və onları asan edin" or "İstifadəçiləriniz üçün bir neçə ərazi yaratmaq və asanlaşdırmaq üçün bu bölməyə baxın."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "lisätäksesi käyttäjillesi niihin oikeudet" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "make them accessible for your users". It implies granting permissions, rather than simply making the spaces available for use.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä osiota luodaksesi useita tiloja ja varmistaaksesi, että käyttäjät voivat käyttää niitä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "make them accessible for your users" is not perfectly captured by "ユーザーがアクセスできるように設定できます". While the meaning is similar, a more accurate translation would convey the idea of enabling access, not just configuring it. "設定できます" implies configuration rather than enabling functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このセクションでは、いくつかのスペースを作成し、ユーザーが利用できるようにできます (Kono sekushon dewa,ikutsu ka no supēsu o sakusei shi, yūzā ga riyō dekiru yō ni dekimasu).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රවේශ කිරීමට' (praveśayakarmikama) is a more formal or technical term for 'access'. A more natural and user-friendly translation for 'accessible' in this context might be 'ලබා ගැනීමට' (labā gānemu) or 'ප්‍රමාණවත්' (pramānavaṭa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: හිස්තැන් කිහිපයක් සෑදීමට සහ ඔබේ පරිශීලකයින්ට ඒවා ලබා ගැනීමට/ප්‍රමාණවත් කිරීමට මෙම කොටස භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'make them accessible for your users' is better translated as 'zabezpečiť ich prístupnosť pre používateľov' or 'umožniť používateľom k nim pristupovať'. 'Sprístupniť ich používateľom' is grammatically correct but doesn't quite capture the nuanced meaning of 'make accessible'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V tejto časti môžete vytvoriť niekoľko priestorov a zabezpečiť ich prístupnosť pre používateľov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'make them accessible' is not perfectly translated. While 'учините их доступним' is grammatically correct, a more natural phrasing in Serbian would convey the intent better.  'Омогућите приступ' or 'Осигурајте да су доступни' would be more common and flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Користите овај одељак да направите неколико простора и осигурајте да су доступни својим корисницима

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "make them accessible" is not perfectly captured by "učinite ih dostupnim". While "dostupnim" addresses accessibility, "učinite" can sound a bit formal or stilted. A more natural phrasing in Serbian would better convey the intent of making the spaces easily usable or accessible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovaj odeljak da napravite nekoliko prostora i učinite ih lakšim za korišćenje svojim korisnicima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "make them accessible for your users" is not accurately translated. "让您的用户可以访问" is a literal translation that is awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize usability and sharing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以使用这个板块创建多个协作空间，并方便您的用户访问

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice which is a bit unnatural in Chinese compared to the English. Active voice often sounds more natural and concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以使用这个板块创建多个协作空间，并让您的用户可以访问
